brainly_data.question: A water wheel makes 28 revolutions in 90 seconds. how many revolutions can it make in 4 minutes?
brainly_data.subject: Mathematics

all_answers.question: A water wheel makes 28 revolutions in 90 seconds. how many revolutions can it make in 4 minutes?
all_answers.subject: Mathematics
all_answers.text:
90 seconds = 1.5 minutes
1.5 minutes = 28 revolutions
Revolutions in 1 minute = 28/1.5 = 18.67 revolutions

Revolutions in 4 minutes = 18.67*4 
                                        = 74.7 (approx.) revolutions
